#How to build Cogbot
  
  # checkout from svn
  # right click on swicli project in SwiProlog folder, choose properties
  # under Common Properties, you will see one or two missing references. Remove them, then add Swicli.Library and SWICLITestDLL  by clicking 'Add New Reference...' button and on Projects tab select these.
  # rebuild the Solution
  # rebuild swicli.library
  # rebuild swicli
